events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering roles, specifically for the software development track.
A recruiter from our engineering talent acquisition team has been assigned to assist you through the interview process.
Your qualifications look promising and we have completed the initial screening to move you forward in the process.
Thank you for your prompt response to our interview invitation. We will now schedule the technical interview accordingly.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare to discuss your software development experience.
You successfully completed the technical interview with our engineering panel, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 25th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well and you expressed alignment with our company values and expectations.
We have extended you an official offer for the Software Engineer role, including details of compensation and start date.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and asked a few clarifying questions regarding benefits.
You accepted our offer to join the engineering team as a Software Engineer, and we are excited to have you onboard.
Your onboarding process has begun with our HR and IT departments to set you up for success on your first day.
The recruitment case for the Software Engineer position has been successfully closed with your official hire.
